#sidebar TableOfContents

{{{
gpg -e -r <name> <filename>

gpg <filename>

gpg --gen-key

gpg --list-keys / -k

gpg --list-secret-key / -K

gpg --export <name> -a > <filename.asc>

gpg --import <filename.asc>

gpg --delete-keys <name>

gpg --delete-secret-keys <name>

gpg --sign-key <name>
}}}
